nodes.description: Quetta的Satellite Town地区Ghousabad社区Maghrib祷告结束后发生爆炸
nodes.support_text: the blast took place shortly after Maghrib prayers in the densely populated Ghousabad neighbourhood of Satellite Town area.

nodes.description: 爆炸已造成15人死亡、多人受伤，包括代警监Haji Amanullah
nodes.support_text: the death toll in a blast... has risen to 15

nodes.description: 执法部门封锁现场并启动调查
nodes.support_text: Law enforcement agencies have cordoned off the area and an investigation into the matter has been initiated

nodes.description: 军方抵达现场开展联合搜救行动
nodes.support_text: FC Bln troops reached Qta blast site. Area cordoned off. A joint search operation with police in progress.

nodes.description: 奎达所有医院宣布进入紧急状态
nodes.support_text: Emergency has been declared at all hospitals in Quetta

nodes.description: 伤员被紧急转移至医院救治
《Express Tribune》报道了死亡人数上升事件
nodes.support_text: 《Express Tribune》报道了死亡人数上升事件

edges.support_text: the death toll in a blast... has risen to 15
Law enforcement agencies have cordoned off the area
an investigation into the matter has been initiated
报道事件发生在死亡人数上升后
FC Bln troops reached Qta blast site
Emergency has been declared at all hospitals in Quetta
